mapper.select: SELECT rownum, board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, member_nick, find_num, find_reward, find_pet, find_lost_loc, find_lost_date, picture_fname FROM (select board.board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member.member_num, member_nick, find_num, find_reward, find_pet, find_lost_loc, find_lost_date, picture_fname from board, member, find, picture where board_type_num = 11 and board.member_num = member.member_num and board.board_num = find.board_num and picture.board_num = find.board_num order by board_num desc) where rownum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, member_nick FROM (SELECT rownum n, board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, member_nick FROM (SELECT board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, MEMBER.member_num, member_nick FROM board, member WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NUM = 11 AND board.member_num = MEMBER.member_num ORDER BY board_num DESC))
and n BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

choose.when: where member_nick like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

mapper.insert: insert into board(board_num,title,content,bdate,views,board_type_num,member_num) values((select nvl(max(board_num), 0)+1 from board), #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 0, 11, 1)

insert into find(find_num,find_reward,find_pet,find_lost_loc,find_lost_date,board_num) values((select nvl(max(find_num), 0)+1 from find),#{find_reward},#{find_pet},#{find_lost_loc},#{find_lost_date},(select nvl(max(board_num), 0) from board))
insert into picture(picture_file_num, picture_fname, board_num) values((select nvl(max(picture_file_num), 0)+1 from picture),#{picture_fname},(select nvl(max(board_num), 0) from board))
mapper.select: select * from find f, board b, picture p, member m where f.board_num = b.board_num and p.board_num = b.board_num and m.member_num = b.member_num and b.board_num=${board_num}
mapper.update: update board set views = views+1 where board_num = #{board_num} and board_type_num = 11
update find set find_reward = #{find_reward}, find_pet = #{find_pet}, find_lost_loc = #{find_lost_loc}, find_lost_date = #{find_lost_date} where board_num = #{board_num}
update board set title=#{title},content=#{content} where board_num = #{board_num}
update picture set picture_fname = #{picture_fname} where board_num = #{board_num}
